posts.message:
[align=center][IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k604/Qwazzy/HF%20News/HFNMain.png[/IMG][/align]

The edition you are currently reading is the [color=gold][b]51st full edition[/b][/color]. To read any older editions of HF News, please go [url=http://hackforums.net/forumdisplay.php?fid=162]here[/url].

[align=center][IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k604/Qwazzy/HF%20News/HFNHeadlines.png[/IMG][/align] 

An old game has a portion of the Hack Forums management addicted including [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4066][color=#00BFFF][b]Judge Dredd[/b][/color][/url], [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033][color=lime][b]xerotic[/b][/color][/url] and [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=81119][b]TsGh Mike[/b][/url]. More information on this simple but amazing game can be found [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1493812]here[/url].

Staff Member [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=70909][color=lime][b]AsSaSs@iN[/b][/color][/url] has requested a vacation ban. He is due to return 08-08-11.

[b][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=175033][color=lime]xerotic[/url][/b][/color] has made yet another upgrade thread for users. If you feel like nominating a deserving member then do so [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1502159]here[/url].

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=31063][color=#0066FF][b]Kurdish(tm)[/b][/color][/url] has claimed that [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=65784][color=lime][b]Xch4ng3[/b][/color][/url] has scammed him of over $400. Check out the Deal Dispute [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1482310]here[/url].

Former Staff member, [b][color=white][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=47360]Saged[/url][/color][/b], has changed his well-known alias to [b]Rety'un[/b], many members are still wondering why.

The new group titled [b]Eminence[/b] has made its appearance this week, the group is led by [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=406243][color=#AAAAFF][b]WiFi.[/b][/color][/url] and [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=323740][b]Positive[/b][/url]. This group is also recruiting. If you would like to apply, please go [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1489553]here[/url]. 

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=37251][color=#0066FF][b]Baked[/b][/color][/url] is now leader of [b]The RATs Crew[/b], this is because [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=132817][color=red][b] S70N3R[/b][/color][/url] has stepped down. Congratulations to him! Hopefully this is a step to further the success of the RATs Crew.

Group leader of [b]Black Knights[/b] and [b]Red Lions[/b], [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=588781][color=black][b]Hуѕтєяιa X™[/b][/color][/url], has requested a ban. No further details are known in regards to this matter.

The Black Knights Group have changed their userbar; see the image [url=http://hfmaxcdn.witza.netdna-cdn.com/images/blackreign/groupimages/english/black-knights.png]here[/url]. 

Former group leader [b][color=blue][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=616850][color=#0066FF]Atthackers[/color][/url][/b][/color] was unable to complete payment on his group, now [b]The Informers[/b] have been permanently dismantled.

[align=center][IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k604/Qwazzy/HF%20News/HFNUsernews.png[/IMG][/align]

Earlier this week, [color=grey][b]Carbon[/b][/color] had asked [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#4DD0FC][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] for a full refund of $183, which he had donated in various forms to HackForums. Needless to say, the claim was refused.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=657392][color=#AAAAFF][b]Astonish is NJ[/b][/color][/url] with the help of his new group has posted "The Ultimate Guide to Keyloggers." if you would like to read their work click [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1501522]here[/url]. 

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=126741][color=#0066FF][b]sol@ris[/b][/color][/url] has created his own unique dedicated hacker ranking and dueling system. Put your hacking skills to the test against hundreds of others [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1501310]here[/url].

Ever wondered how you could keep a long distance relationship alive? This week [b][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=620004]iceybunneh[/url][/b] has made a detailed guide to keep a long distance relationship alive. If you'd like to read the guide, click [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1476029]here[/url].

To continue her old contest, [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=661940][color=#0066FF][b]bugga[/b][/color][/url] is holding another round of her member upgrade contest. The nominations for this round have been chosen; you may now cast your vote [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1498902]here[/url]. There will only be one winner in this round.

The member [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=675453][b]Cyber-Security [/b][/url] has created a very detailed and informative guide about batch scripting this week. It's aimed to help people who have a desire to learn batch scripting. If you'd like to read it, click [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1472638]here[/url].

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=275104][color=white][b]Delicious[/b][/color][/url] has created the ultimate guide to stay secure on the internet. It is definitely worth a read as everyone should know how to stay safe and secure on the internet. You can read the guide [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1497173]here[/url].

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=234024][b]Deities[/b][/url], the leader of The Alliance, who is known for not showing up in the public, has finally decided to post a thread in The Lounge. You can now ask Deities a question [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1490830]here[/url].

[b]This week's Bans and Repfucks[/b][list][*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=516980][color=#FFCC00][b]RepFuckedForAJoke[/b][/color][/url] has been repfucked for [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=1477492]this[/url] thread.
[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=293484][b][color=black]A N K E S H[/color][/b][/url] has been banned for arguing and flaming after receiving a warning from [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=103669][color=lime][b]Factor8™[/b][/color][/url].
[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=126524][color=red][b]Woe Is Me[/b][/color][/url] is limited.
[*][b][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=407835][color=red]Kick Buttowski[/b][/url][/color] has been limited for Disallowed Blackhat Acitvity.
[*][url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=344143][color=red][b]Crayo[/b][/color][/url] has been repfucked.[/list]

[align=center][IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k604/Qwazzy/HF%20News/HFNOther.png[/IMG][/align]

Watch out! The police are cracking down on lemonade stands now! I have no income now. Police have shut down three girl's lemonade stand. They said that the girls are not allowed to sell lemonade without a business license. This really brought down people's respect for the police in Midway. Next, they'll be cracking down on mowing people's lawn.

Click below if you'd like to watch the video.
[spoiler][yt]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mPKUUH7ytUo[/yt][/spoiler]

[align=center][IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k604/Qwazzy/HF%20News/HFNInterviews.png[/IMG][/align]

[size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva][color=deepskyblue]Interview 1 - Rusty_v[/color][/font][/size]
[spoiler][color=white][b]Astonish is NJ:[/b][/color] Hello Rusty_V, and thank you for participating in the 51st edition of the HF News. Would you like to make any opening statements?
[color=lime][b]Rusty_v:[/b][/color] Hackforums! It's a pleasure getting interviewed.

[color=white][b]Astonish is NJ:[/b][/color] So. Why did you join HF?
[color=lime][b]Rusty_v:[/b][/color] I was searching for Gmail bruteforcer and landed up here.

[color=white][b]Astonish is NJ:[/b][/color] If you had to pick one person to give the Member of the Month award to, who would it be?
[color=lime][b]Rusty_v:[/b][/color] Peter Chao

[color=white][b]Astonish is NJ:[/b][/color]You have been here for a long time now, What big changes have you seen in this forum?
[color=lime][b]Rusty_v:[/b][/color] Well, when I joined this forum wasn't so big, Around 50k members, Scam report section was dead, Lounge was better than now. I spent time learning about new things. Good ol days. :P 

[color=white][b]Astonish is NJ:[/b][/color] You are the third longest-serving staff member, How do you feel about that?
[color=lime][b]Rusty_v:[/b][/color] Feels great to serve such a big forum with such a cooperative team.

[color=white][b]Astonish is NJ:[/b][/color] Would you consider yourself the hardest working staff member? if not who would you say is?
[color=lime][b]Rusty_v:[/b][/color] Hardest working staff in the sense? Let me clear this up, Some staff's do reports more, others take their time resolving other complain, So everyone is doing their job, Yes I said JOB.

[color=white][b]Astonish is NJ:[/b][/color] So.. Would you consider your self the harshest staff member?
[color=lime][b]Rusty_v:[/b][/color]  I warn for almost every infraction, if members think it is harsh, I would say this is my job, get used to it.

[color=white][b]Astonish is NJ:[/b][/color] Off that, I know you were scammed out of $2k. Being you now have experience doing deals, what would you have done differently?
[color=lime][b]Rusty_v:[/b][/color] It was feb 2010, I dealt with him before, everything was fine but I didn't knew of his intensions.I sent him $1250 for exchange to WU. Took away my money + Around $5k from other members. As the quote says "Everything happens for a good reason, Keep walking" I take care while dealing with members, I've made over $60,000 USD from hf, so I don't really care about those scams anymore.

[color=white][b]Astonish is NJ:[/b][/color]That really sucks.. Sorry! Do you mind telling us the scammers username and if he still comes on Hack Forums.
[color=lime][b]Rusty_v:[/b][/color] UID=27177, Not logged in from years. 

[color=white][b]Astonish is NJ:[/b][/color] Are there any members who inspire you to come on hf and do what you do?
[color=lime][b]Rusty_v:[/b][/color] UID=27177, Not logged in from years. 

[color=white][b]Astonish is NJ:[/b][/color] Damn, this went by fast do you have any shoutouts you would like to make before saying goodbye?
[color=lime][b]Rusty_v:[/b][/color] Too many people to thank, firstly with the interviewer, Factor8, Wicked Devil, Invincible, Psychotic, Xch4ng3, ... and <3 Vazir.

[color=white][b]Astonish is NJ:[/b][/color] Thanks Rusty_v for all you do for HF, Thanks for taking your time for an interview.
[color=lime][b]Rusty_v:[/b][/color] Thanks for interviewing me, cya hf.[/spoiler]

[size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva][color=deepskyblue]Interview 2 - SeaNanners™[/color][/font][/size]
[spoiler][color=#FFCC00][b]Seductive™:[/b][/color]  Hello, SeaNanners™, and thank you for this interview. First thing I would like to ask, what made you join Hack Forums?
[color=#0066FF][b]SeaNanners™ :[/b][/color] I found HackForums on Google, when I typed in ''Hack free Brazzers accounts'', Then obviously I sign up and PM'ed the Brazzers account seller.

[color=#FFCC00][b]Seductive™:[/b][/color]  When you first joined, what did you think of the forum?
[color=#0066FF][b]SeaNanners™:[/b][/color] I was quite active when I first signed up to be honest. Why? I see users giving away free stuff such as ''Free YouTube Subscribers'' ''BOTS'' and free Steam Accounts etc. Therefore, why I'm very active. The atmosphere back then and now are the same. In fact more TROLLS and Noobs now.

[color=#FFCC00][b]Seductive™:[/b][/color]  What do you think of the recent HackForums Changes ? 
[color=#0066FF][b]SeaNanners™:[/b][/color] What changes? There isn't any changes? I'm still waiting for the ''VOUCH'' System to be announced. I joined HackForums 20th April, 2011, and now 8th July 2011, still the Vouch system hasn't finished and completed yet...

[color=#FFCC00][b]Seductive™:[/b][/color]  What is your favorite group, and why is it your favorite?
[color=#0066FF][b]SeaNanners™:[/b][/color] My favorite group is probably the Alliance group, because I like the shiny badge hehehe.

[color=#FFCC00][b]Seductive™:[/b][/color]  Which award do you feel most proud of? Why do you take so much pride in it?
[color=#0066FF][b]SeaNanners™:[/b][/color] I'm very proud of my ''Fish Err Man'' Award. I take so much pride, because I'm an Award slut.

[color=#FFCC00][b]Seductive™:[/b][/color]  What member do you respect the most on Hack Forums?
[color=#0066FF][b]SeaNanners™:[/b][/color] Omni, nuff said.

[color=#FFCC00][b]Seductive™:[/b][/color]  What is your favorite section on Hack Forums? Least favorite?
[color=#0066FF][b]SeaNanners™:[/b][/color] My favorite section on HackForums is Innuendo section, because I LOL, LMAO, ROFL most of time because of the topics. My least favorite is the Playstation 3 section, because I haven't got a PS3.

[color=#FFCC00][b]Seductive™:[/b][/color]  Hmm I see That you love cats, do you actually have one ?
[color=#0066FF][b]SeaNanners™:[/b][/color] Yes, I have. I will post a video soon.

[color=#FFCC00][b]Seductive™:[/b][/color]  That's really cool. Anyways, if you were in Omniscient's position, what would you change about Hack Forums?
[color=#0066FF][b]SeaNanners™:[/b][/color] If I was Omniscient, I would change the layout colour. Purple and green is not a good match?

[color=#FFCC00][b]Seductive™:[/b][/color]  Thank you for your time, any final comments? 
[color=#0066FF][b]SeaNanners™:[/b][/color] Well, I would like to thank you for taking the time to interview me and also the HF news team for all the work that they have done.

[color=#FFCC00][b]Seductive™:[/b][/color]  This concludes our interview, thank you SeaNanners™ for your time![/spoiler]
